price: 7. Мре toyebisaki na mama ya Mûssa ete: Melisa ye, mpe soki okobanga тропа ye, bwaka ye na mayi, kasi koyimayima te mpe kolenga te, ya soló, tokozongisa ye epai nayo. Mpe tokotia ye azala okati ya batindami.
arabic: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَرۡضِعِيهِۖ فَإِذَا خِفۡتِ عَلَيۡهِ فَأَلۡقِيهِ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَلَا تَخَافِي وَلَا تَحۡزَنِيٓۖ إِنَّا رَآدُّوهُ إِلَيۡكِ وَجَاعِلُوهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā ummi mūsā an arḍiʿīhi fa-idhā khif'ti ʿalayhi fa-alqīhi fī al-yami walā takhāfī walā taḥzanī innā rāddūhu ilayki wajāʿilūhu mina al-mur'salīna
